item.title: Remembering the Boxing Day Tsunami
item.author: Laz Ranasinghe,
item.description: December has always been a time of deep reflection for me. As the lights erupt and the Christmas spirit envelops the nation, it truly is a special time of the year. However, it makes me value the importance of family and the sanctity of life for a very different reason. On Boxing Day 2004, the â€¦
